channel.title: Add a new type of Moderator
channel.description: A "Forum of Lies Moderator" or similar. The amount of times that I've had to ask a mod to lock/unlock my game or revert deleted or edited posts is far too high. Giving trusted hosts moderator powers solely within the Forum Matches category, if possible, would be immensely useful, especially as the forum games grow.

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
They can’t dilute the powerpool though or they risk an uprising.

#¡Viva la revolución!

Read full topic

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
There is no justifiable reason to not give some modding privileges to frequent trustworthy hosts.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a new type of Moderator

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
It’s not hard for me to ask, but it is hard when none of you are online or when you’re all busy. The less stress modding a game puts on the mods, the better. I stopped locking and unlocking my game for these reasons alone, but if some player decides to be untrustworthy or is just not knowledgable and posts, there is nothing I could do to stop them without directly involving a moderator. I may not end up hosting all the time, and I don’t personally need to be one of these FoL Mods, but I feel that it will eventually be necessary.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a new type of Moderator

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I agree with orange. Orange, PKR and other frequent hosters could have basic mod privileges on posts in the forum games category.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a new type of Moderator

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
That’s what they’ve been doing so far, but keeping it that way seems overly restrictive. I agree that this change is not needed now, but if ToL keeps growing so will FoL. Preventing people from hosting should be out of the question, and if some people eventually start hosting a lot but don’t become full moderators it just makes sense to make them FoL Mods.

Read full topic
item.source: Add a new type of Moderator

item.title: Add a new type of Moderator
item.dc:creator: Jordarrian
item.description:
Why not just, you know, let the ToL mods host them instead? The community is way too small to add FoL Mods

Read full topic
